event.title: FINODEX accelerator looking for start-ups in Bristol
event.description:
Next week we will present FINODEX accelerator. An EU Project looking to promote FIWARE technologies and open data among start-ups and entrepreneurs. We are an accelerator offering funds (up to â‚¬170k per project) and free services for start-ups.
If you are interested come and meet us next Wednesday at the Engine Shed.
http://finodex-bristol.eventbrite.co.uk
